hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select t1.COLUMN_NAME as column_name,t1.DATA_TYPE as data_type, t2.COMMENTS as remark from all_tab_columns t1, all_col_comments t2 where t1.TABLE_NAME = t2.TABLE_NAME and t1.COLUMN_NAME = t2.COLUMN_NAME and t1.TABLE_NAME = :tableName and t1.OWNER = t2.OWNER and t1.OWNER = :owner
